title: A tweek to Pantheon maybe?
body:
Morning all,
Ever since Pantheon has been our beloved Baker of the rift disguised as a mighty Spartan I feel that he needs a rework, feel free to tear this up and go about your days like nothing ever happened, just hear me out for a moment.

Keep his passive of 4 basics attacks you do activates his block (like a spartan would I suppose) 

Change his Q from a cast on target spell to a decently ranged skillshot either like a Nidalee spear or something of similar projectile width (e.g. Ezreals Q with on hit effects?)

Change his W from the click stun which activates his passive to a spartan kick or shield slam backwards which wouldnt activate is passive, just give a stack or 2.

Change the spear fluffy of a E into something broken like a Rivens Q combo minus the knock up and true damage she dishes out. It would have 3-4 charges like Rivens Q, make it a skill shot/ aiming shot with minimal movement.

Keep his ultimate the same, just rework it so it feel like a massive jump across the map like Galio minus the knock up of course. 

Hope to hear back from the riot team.

replies.body: Pantheon seems more like an Athenian than a Spartan to me, or do you not know there is a difference between classical Greek nation states?
